title: Breville® Hemisphere™ Blenders with Chef Heston Blumenthal
description: Entirely self-taught, Heston Blumenthal is the most progressive chef of his generation. In this video he explores why some blenders leave ingredients like ice and honey lumpy and why some blenders, like the Breville Hemisphere™ Blenders, don't. Even blending. Even texture.

asset.title: Breville® Hemisphere™ Blenders with Chef Heston Blumenthal
asset.description:
For more about Breville, visit http://www.brevilleusa.com.

Entirely self-taught, Heston Blumenthal is the most progressive chef of his generation. In this video he explores why some blenders leave ingredients like ice and honey lumpy and why some blenders, like the Breville Hemisphere™ Blenders, don't. Even blending. Even texture.

To learn more about Chef Heston Blumenthal, visit FoodThinkers.com:
http://www.foodthinkers.com/contributors/heston-blumenthal/

To learn more about Breville Blenders, visit BrevilleUSA.com:
http://www.brevilleusa.com/beverages/blenders.html
